question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-batch-encryption/src/shared/algebra/mult_tree.rs] [Function: quotient()] [Side channel] Does the quotient computation leak information about divisor_index through timing, memory access patterns, or power consumption that could compromise batch encryption privacy?
